name: donetick
description: Donetick is a self-hosted to-do and task tracking application with projects, due dates, priorities, and recurring tasks. Its clean web interface is designed to make personal productivity and small team planning straightforward and private.

features.title: Task Management
features.description: Create, organize, and track tasks with due dates, priorities, and completion status

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Monitor upcoming deadlines with calendar views and notification reminders

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share projects with team members and assign tasks with role-based permissions

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View productivity statistics and completion trends with visual charts and reports

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Responsive web interface optimized for smartphones and tablets with offline capabilities
